sentence.Network_en: Amaterasu's main sanctuary is situated on Ise, on the island of Honshu.
sentence.Network_cn: 天照的主要圣殿坐落在伊势,即本州岛上.

sentence.Network_en: A city of extreme northern Honshu, Japan, on Aomori Bay.
sentence.Network_cn: 青森日本本州岛最北部青森湾上的一座城市.

sentence.Network_en: A city of southern Honshu, Japan, on Osaka Bay south - southwest of Kyoto.
sentence.Network_cn: 神户日本本州南部一城市, 位于大阪湾沿岸、京都西南偏南.

means.word_mean: 1. the central and largest of the four main islands of Japan; between the Sea of Japan and the Pacific Ocean; regarded as the Japanese mainland

auth_sentence.content: 'Outer-rise' The USGS modelling also suggests an increase in earthquake risk in northern Honshu, in the Sanriku region.

auth_sentence.content: In the south of Honshu and in Kyushu and Shikoku the winters are mild and almost subtropical.

auth_sentence.content: Winter precipitation is particularly heavy on the west coast of northern Honshu and in Hokkaido.
